channel.title: Lucas Draescher on draescherl

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Email LinkedIn GitHub Credits I’d like to give credit to d-asnaghi for porting the awesome HTML5 UP Dimension theme to Hugo.

item.title: Intro
item.description: Why write this blog ? I’ve come to a point where I’m confident enough in my capabilities as a developer to start writing about some projects I’m working on. The objective of this is to have a history of what I’ve worked on, a kind of personal documentation (because we always remember everything right). Hopefully you’ll enjoy the content I’ll be putting out, and maybe someone might learn a thing or two !

item.title: Whoami
item.description: General information Where I studied ~/2020-2023 > pwd /france/pau/cytech-ecole-ingenieur ~/2018-2020 > pwd /france/pau/eisti-prepa-integree ~/2018 > pwd /france/pau/lycee-saint-cricq The languages I speak ~/ > locale -a fr_FR.utf8 en_IE.utf8 Hard skills ~/ > ls -R ./web-development: html-css-js php sql vue.js angular express hugo ./low-level: c nasm32 ./object-oriented: java ./scripting: node.js python bash ./systems-administration: linux gitlab-ci-cd docker nginx wireguard aws-ec2 ./others: pascal prolog R
